name: Machine Lat Pulldown
instructions: Adjust the seat height so that your thighs fit comfortably under the pads.
Grasp the handles with an overhand grip, hands wider than shoulder-width apart.
Sit down and secure your legs under the pads.
Pull the handles down towards your upper chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement.
Slowly return the handles to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Repeat for the recommended number of repetitions.
